text: @brithume Right now is the best time to engage in all kinds of high risk behavior. Ride bulls, skydive, motorcycle without a helmet, drink heavily & eat lotsa bacon. Because right now nothing else can kill you except Coronavirus. Just ask #FireFauci & #Birx. They're "experts"
